author: andschwa
body: xUnit runner fails to load reference assemblies because it attempts to load them by a strong name without a version string, which CoreCLR's corerun then disallows ? or in some way fails . xUnit cannot load a reference assembly from outside the platform assemblies. Waiting on response from CoreCLR team. VSO create date - 6/8/2015 14:05:00     VSO closed date - 7/20/2015 16:09:00
title: Use xUnit runner to collect and execute unit tests
